Class KalmanFilter

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.statistics.timeseries.KalmanFilter
public class KalmanFilter extends Object
Kalman filter for state estimation in linear dynamic systems. State-space model: x_k = F * x_{k-1} + B * u_k + w_k (state transition) z_k = H * x_k + v_k (measurement) where w_k ~ N(0, Q) and v_k ~ N(0, R) * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Creates a Kalman filter.

    Method
    Description
    double[][]
    getCovariance()
    Returns current state covariance.
    double[]
    getState()
    Returns current state estimate.
    void
    predict(double[] controlInput)
    Prediction step (time update). x_k|k-1 = F * x_{k-1} + B * u P_k|k-1 = F * P_{k-1} * F^T + Q
    void
    setControlMatrix(double[][] B)
    Sets the control input matrix B.
    void
    setMeasurementMatrix(double[][] H)
    Sets the measurement matrix H.

    setMeasurementNoise(double[][] R)
    Sets the measurement noise covariance R.
    void
    setProcessNoise(double[][] Q)
    Sets the process noise covariance Q.
    void
    setState(double[] initialState, double[][] initialCovariance)
    Initializes the state estimate.
    void
    setTransitionMatrix(double[][] F)
    Sets the state transition matrix F.
    void
    update(double[] measurement)
    Update step (measurement update). y = z - H * x (innovation) S = H * P * H^T + R (innovation covariance) K = P * H^T * S^-1 (Kalman gain) x = x + K * y P = (I - K*H) * P

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • predict

      public void predict(double[] controlInput)
      Prediction step (time update). x_k|k-1 = F * x_{k-1} + B * u P_k|k-1 = F * P_{k-1} * F^T + Q
      Parameters:
      controlInput - Optional control input (can be null)

    • update

      public void update(double[] measurement)
      Update step (measurement update). y = z - H * x (innovation) S = H * P * H^T + R (innovation covariance) K = P * H^T * S^-1 (Kalman gain) x = x + K * y P = (I - K*H) * P
      Parameters:
      measurement - Measurement vector z

    • getState

      public double[] getState()
      Returns current state estimate.
